product_name: The North Face Oso Hoodie Fleece Jacket - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Oso hoodie offers active girls all the performance and style of the epic Denali jacket plus a hood for the perfect blend of style and comfort. Incredibly soft polyester fleece dries quickly and resists pilling, and it keeps her warm without weighing her down. Reinforced shoulder panels repel light precipitation; tricot-lined pockets warm chilly hands. Elastic binding at cuffs, hood and hand pockets; partial elastic hem fits snugly around waist for moisture protection. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Oso hoodie offers active girls all the performance and style of the epic Denali jacket plus a hood for the perfect blend of style and comfort.
